ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Glad to see a new group and need help with EP flaggs
ygData.msgSnippet: No, you need to zone into BoT from PoStorms. If you don t do this, you haven t actually finished the quest and won t get the key. ... From: Wulfric Rennison
ygData.messageBody:
No, you need to zone into BoT from PoStorms.
If you don't do this, you haven't actually finished the quest and won't get the key.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Wulfric Rennison
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 08, 2005 10:43 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Glad to see a new group and need help with EP flaggs

This is actualyl the BOT key quest which takes place in Plane of Storms. 
 
As you've noticed the quest is in two parts.  If you've already turned in the beard, bone, and sash, you have to follow the prompts and Askr gives you another bag.  Then you need to put the two medallions (fromd ifferent camps) in the bag and hit combine.  then hand the bag back to Askr.  That will get you the character flag and gain you access to Bastion of Thunder.  If you just tried handing the medallions back to him without the bag it wont work.  My guess is that you're going to need to camp the named giants again and get two more medallions, get another bag from Askr and try to finish the 2nd part again.
 
Wulfric
----- Original Message -----
From: Lisa
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, November 07, 2005 5:59 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Glad to see a new group and need help with EP flaggs

Howdy All:
REALLY GLAD to see a new group---the only reason I joined the old
group was to find people who were experienced in EQ and could help out
in a crisis--not to see all that spam mail. 
I'm having a crisis now.  My friend did the POStorms key (beard, bone
sash, 2 medallions) however, it looks like he never got credit for
doing the turn in and the seer gives him a message that the 2
medallions have not been turned in.  Is it possible that the
medallions he gave to Askr the Lost came from the same camp and that
is why he has not been given credit ??? We have tried to "rehail" askr
but he just gives a message to move along.


Thanks All
Tart
Wraith of Discord
Maelin Starpyre Rules!!! lol
